2001-3260 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE ex rel. Jerrell MCCALLON v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 2001-KH-3260. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re McCallon, Jerrell; Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Beauregard, 36th Judicial District Court Div. A, No. CR-466-94; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No(s). 01-00226-KH, 01-00791-KH.

Denied.
